definition: lit. the whip cannot reach (idiom); beyond one's influence/too far to be able to help
whip or lash/to flog/to whip/conductor's baton/segmented iron weapon (old)/penis (of animal, served as food)
chief/head/elder/to grow/to develop/to increase/to enhance
length/long/forever/always/constantly
do not/there is none who
surname Mo
and/to reach/up to/in time for

sentences.english: The Carpathians are far from that country.
sentences.chinese: 喀爾巴阡山是在該國鞭長莫及的地方。

sentences.english: And anti-pollution measures and regulations are falling far short of getting to grips with it.
sentences.chinese: 而反污染措施及規章則鞭長莫及，束手無策。

sentences.english: I cannot help him because it is beyond my grasp.
sentences.chinese: 我不能幫助他，是因爲我鞭長莫及。

sentences.english: To respond to the regime, the national law also can't reach the rural area.
sentences.chinese: 與政權相呼應，國家法對於鄉村僻壤也顯得鞭長莫及。

to ask for trouble/to invite difficulties
to change one's mind/to go back on one's word
hard to explain in a few words (idiom); complicated and not easy to express succinctly
habit becomes nature (idiom); get used to something and it seems inevitable/second nature
the rarer sth is, the greater its value (idiom)
unstable/erratic/changeable/fickle
to die/euphemism, lit. to return West or to the Western Paradise
argumentative/quarrelsome
to become visible/to appear/to manifest one's true nature
to kill to the last one (idiom)/to exterminate/to eradicate/ruthless
bane of one's existence/vile spawn
belt (in trousers)/CL:根[gen1]
to act with undue haste (idiom); eager and impatient/overhasty
